page.title: 11ROSEL TWINNED WITH GOODLEIGH
page.content: Goodleigh is twinned with Rosel in France. One year people from Goodleigh go to Rosel and the next people from Rosel come to Goodleigh.We go to Weymouth by coach then we get on a ferry and go to Cherbourg in France which takes us 4 hours. We get back on the coach and go to Rosel. We stay for 5 days in people's houses.Rosel is a little village but has many more people than Goodleigh. They are very nice but tend to shout and argue a lot with each other. They have lots of activities for us when we get there like barbeque's games etc.The French drink lots of beer and wine.They eat snail soup,fruit and Pizza.
